typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as integer,
		VKORG as string,
		VTWEG as string,
		KOKRS as string,
		BUKRS as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		BUTXT as string,
		ORT01 as string,
		LAND1 as string,
		VKORG_VTEXT as string,
		VTWEG_VTEXT as string,
		KOKRS_BEZEI as string,
		HASHKEY_BK as string,
		HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CLEANSE.ORGA',
	format: 'query') ~> SourceCleanseOrga
source(output(
		CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK as string,
		CORG_MANDT as string,
		CORG_VKORG as string,
		CORG_VTWEG as string,
		CORG_KOKRS as string,
		CORG_BUKRS as string,
		CORG_SPRAS as string,
		CORG_BUTXT as string,
		CORG_ORT01 as string,
		CORG_LAND1 as string,
		CORG_VKORG_VTEXT as string,
		CORG_VTWEG_VTEXT as string,
		CORG_KOKRS_BEZEI as string,
		CORG_HASHKEY_BK as string,
		CORG_HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CORG_CREATED_ON as string,
		CORG_SOURCE as string,
		CORG_VALID_FROM as string,
		CORG_VALID_TO as string,
		CORG_CURRENT_FLAG as string,
		CORG_DML_STRAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CORE.DIM_ORGA',
	format: 'query') ~> SourceCoreOrga
filterActiveRows aggregate(MAXSK = max(toInteger(CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK))) ~> CoreDimMaterialMaxSk
SourceCleanseOrga, filterActiveRows lookup(MANDT == toInteger(CORG_MANDT)
	&& SPRAS == CORG_SPRAS
	&& VKORG == CORG_VKORG
	&& VTWEG == CORG_VTWEG,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(!isNull(CORG_HASHKEY_BK) && notEquals(CORG_HASHKEY_DATA, HASHKEY_DATA),
	isNull(CORG_HASHKEY_BK),
	disjoint: false) ~> UpDataRows@(updateRows, newRows, doNothing)
UpDataRows@updateRows derive(CURRENT_FLAG = 'N',
		VALID_TO = currentTimestamp(),
		DML_STRAT = 'HIST_UPD') ~> derivedColForUpdatedRow
derivedColForUpdatedRow alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> alterRowforUpdate
UpDataRows@newRows keyGenerate(output(SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> createSk
createSk, CoreDimMaterialMaxSk join(SK == MAXSK || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMax
JoinMax derive(NEWSK = SK + MAXSK,
		VALID_FROM = currentTimestamp(),
		VALID_TO = toTimestamp('2999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		DML_STRAT = iif(notEquals(CORG_HASHKEY_DATA, HASHKEY_DATA), 'HIST_INS', 'INS'),
		SOURCE = 'CLEANSE.ORG',
		CREATED_ON = currentTimestamp(),
		CURRENT_FLAG = 'Y') ~> derivedColForNewRows
derivedColForNewRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> alterRowforInsert
SourceCoreOrga filter(CORG_CURRENT_FLAG == 'Y') ~> filterActiveRows
alterRowforUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK,
		CORG_VALID_TO = VALID_TO,
		CORG_CURRENT_FLAG = CURRENT_FLAG,
		CORG_DML_STRAT = DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetUpdateCoreDimOrg
alterRowforInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CORG_DIM_ORGA_SK = NEWSK,
		CORG_MANDT = MANDT,
		CORG_VKORG = VKORG,
		CORG_VTWEG = VTWEG,
		CORG_KOKRS = KOKRS,
		CORG_BUKRS = BUKRS,
		CORG_SPRAS = SPRAS,
		CORG_BUTXT = BUTXT,
		CORG_ORT01 = ORT01,
		CORG_LAND1 = LAND1,
		CORG_VKORG_VTEXT = VKORG_VTEXT,
		CORG_VTWEG_VTEXT = VTWEG_VTEXT,
		CORG_KOKRS_BEZEI = KOKRS_BEZEI,
		CORG_HASHKEY_BK = HASHKEY_BK,
		CORG_HASHKEY_DATA = HASHKEY_DATA,
		CORG_CREATED_ON = CREATED_ON,
		CORG_SOURCE = SOURCE,
		CORG_VALID_FROM = VALID_FROM,
		CORG_VALID_TO = VALID_TO,
		CORG_CURRENT_FLAG = CURRENT_FLAG,
		CORG_DML_STRAT = DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetInsertCoreDimOrg
